Zero.ToolTip: The mandatory checkings. If you want to disable a warning message about whether the preset file was customized, remove the "-Warning" argument

One.ToolTip: The mandatory checkings. No argument therefore no warning message about whether you've customized the preset file

Zero.ToolTip: Enable script logging. The log will be being recorded into the script folder. To stop logging just close the console or type "Stop-Transcript"
Create a restore point
Disable the "Connected User Experiences and Telemetry" service (DiagTrack), and block the connection for the Unified Telemetry Client Outbound Traffic

One.ToolTip: Enable the DiagTrack service, firewall rule for Unified Telemetry Client Outbound Traffic and allow connection (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Set the OS level of diagnostic data gathering to minimum

One.ToolTip: Set the diagnostic data collection to default (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Turn off the Windows Error Reporting

One.ToolTip: Turn on the Windows Error Reporting (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Change the feedback frequency to "Never"

One.ToolTip: Change the feedback frequency to "Automatically" (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Turn off the diagnostics tracking scheduled tasks

One.ToolTip: Turn on the diagnostics tracking scheduled tasks (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Do not use sign-in info to automatically finish setting up device and reopen apps after an update or restart

One.ToolTip: Let websites provide locally relevant content by accessing language list (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Do not allow apps to use advertising ID

One.ToolTip: Allow apps to use advertising ID (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Hide the Windows welcome experiences after updates and occasionally when I sign in to highlight what's new and suggested

One.ToolTip: Do not get tips and suggestions when I use Windows

One.ToolTip: Show me suggested content in the Settings app (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Turn off automatic installing suggested apps

One.ToolTip: Turn on automatic installing suggested apps (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Do not let Microsoft offer you tailored expereinces based on the diagnostic data setting you hava chosen

One.ToolTip: Let Microsoft offer you tailored expereinces based on the diagnostic data setting you hava chosen (default value)

One.ToolTip: Enable Bing search in the Start Menu (default value)

One.ToolTip: Hide the "This PC" icon on Desktop (default value)

One.ToolTip: Use check boxes to select items (default value)

One.ToolTip: Do not show hidden files, folders, and drives (default value)

One.ToolTip: Hide folder merge conflicts (default value)

One.ToolTip: Install OneDrive 64-bit

Zero.ToolTip: Turn on Storage Sense

One.ToolTip: Turn off Storage Sense (default value)

One.ToolTip: Run Storage Sense during low free disk space (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Delete temporary files that apps aren't using (default value)

One.ToolTip: Do not delete temporary files that apps aren't using

Zero.ToolTip: Disable hibernation. Do not recommend turning it off on laptops

One.ToolTip: Enable hibernate (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Change the %TEMP% environment variable path to %SystemDrive%\Temp

One.ToolTip: Change %TEMP% environment variable path to %LOCALAPPDATA%\Temp (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Disable the Windows 260 characters path limit

One.ToolTip: Enable the Windows 260 character path limit (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Display the Stop error information on the BSoD

One.ToolTip: Do not display the Stop error information on the BSoD (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Choose when to be notified about changes to your computer: never notify

One.ToolTip: Choose when to be notified about changes to your computer: notify me only when apps try to make changes to my computer (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Turn on access to mapped drives from app running with elevated permissions with Admin Approval Mode enabled

One.ToolTip: Turn off access to mapped drives from app running with elevated permissions with Admin Approval Mode enabled (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Turn off Delivery Optimization

One.ToolTip: Turn on Delivery Optimization (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Always wait for the network at computer startup and logon for workgroup networks

One.ToolTip: Never wait for the network at computer startup and logon for workgroup networks (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Do not let Windows manage my default printer

One.ToolTip: Let Windows manage my default printer (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Disable the Windows features using the pop-up dialog box

One.ToolTip: Enable the Windows features using the pop-up dialog box (default value)

One.ToolTip: Install optional features using the pop-up dialog box (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Receive updates for other Microsoft products when you update Windows

One.ToolTip: Do not receive updates for other Microsoft products when you update Windows (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Set power plan on "High performance". It isn't recommended to turn on the "High performance" power plan on laptops

One.ToolTip: Set the power plan on "Balanced" (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Use the latest installed .NET runtime for all apps

One.ToolTip: Do not use the latest installed .NET runtime for all apps (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Do not allow the computer to turn off the network adapters to save power

One.ToolTip: Allow the computer to turn off the network adapters to save power (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Disable the Internet Protocol Version 6 (TCP/IPv6) component for all network connections. Before invoking the function, a check will be run whether your ISP supports the IPv6 protocol using https://ipv6-test.com

One.ToolTip: Enable the Internet Protocol Version 6 (TCP/IPv6) component for all network connections (default value). Before invoking the function, a check will be run whether your ISP supports the IPv6 protocol using https://ipv6-test.com

Zero.ToolTip: Override for default input method: English

One.ToolTip: Override for default input method: use language list (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Move user folders location to the root of any drive using the interactive menu. User files or folders won't me moved to a new location. Move them manually. They're located in the %USERPROFILE% folder by default

One.ToolTip: Select folders for user folders location manually using a folder browser dialog. User files or folders won't me moved to a new location. Move them manually. They're located in the %USERPROFILE% folder by default

Two.ToolTip: Change user folders location to the default values. User files or folders won't me moved to a new location. Move them manually. They're located in the %USERPROFILE% folder by default (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Save screenshots by pressing Win+PrtScr on the Desktop. The function will be applied only if the preset is configured to remove OneDrive. Otherwise the backup functionality for the "Desktop" and "Pictures" folders in OneDrive breaks

One.ToolTip: Save screenshots by pressing Win+PrtScr in the Pictures folder (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Run troubleshooter automatically, then notify. In order this feature to work the OS level of diagnostic data gathering will be set to "Optional diagnostic data" and the error reporting feature will be turned on

One.ToolTip: Ask me before running troubleshooters. In order this feature to work the OS level of diagnostic data gathering will be set to "Optional diagnostic data" and the error reporting feature will be turned on (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Launch folder windows in a separate process

One.ToolTip: Do not launch folder windows in a separate process (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Disable and delete reserved storage after the next update installation

One.ToolTip: Enable reserved storage (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Disable help lookup via F1

One.ToolTip: Enable help lookup via F1 (default value)

One.ToolTip: Disable Num Lock at startup (default value)

One.ToolTip: Enable Caps Lock (default value)

One.ToolTip: Turn on pressing the Shift key 5 times to turn Sticky keys (default value)

One.ToolTip: Use AutoPlay for all media and devices (default value)

Zero.ToolTip: Disable thumbnail cache removal

One.ToolTip: Enable thumbnail cache removal (default value)

One.ToolTip: Disable automatically saving my restartable apps when signing out and restart them after signing in (default value)

One.ToolTip: Disable "Network Discovery" and "File and Printers Sharing" for workgroup networks (default value)

One.ToolTip: Manually adjust active hours for me based on daily usage (default value)

One.ToolTip: Do not restart this device as soon as possible when a restart is required to install an update (default value)
